 Apocalypse had followed them into the briefing room
with his troops. He sat down and watched as  Cyngra
started. He nodded his head and thouhgt of the
disobidient destructacons. He liked them. They'd be
useful. He stood up after Cyngar finished  and pulled
out his fire sword. He raised it high looking at his
fellow destrons. "Destrons...today we start what will
be a glorius and never ending reign of evil and
destruction. This is the moment....this is our time
now. We will show these other bots what we can do. We
will conquer this planet and win the Beast Wars. Now
as you all now I am in command in the battle field I
will be connected to you all in your comms sending
orders if necessary. We are joined by our allies the
predacons. They also will help us in our fight. And I
am privaleged to have them with us. Now lets go slag
something." He turned his back and activated his
signal disquiser. Klank and Neptune did the same.
Magmatron threw drill bot a few signal blockers.
"Something to give us some edge." He turned back and
the three started off towards the trainer base.
